body_html:
@ArtsiomCh We've pushed a 1.3.1-alpha AAR (built from master between 1.3.0 and any upcoming 1.3.1 branch) which contains the native patch necessary to run the model (fixes the Switch error). We'll add some notes for future incompatibilities of this nature to suggest, when using the 'none' build type, to download at a pinned revision branch and fix the TF AAR version in build.gradle to ensure that a known compatible AAR is downloaded.

Closing this issue and tracking the missing convertYUV420SPToARGB8888 method in #12593 (I see there is also a PR pending to add this as well)

We'll add some notes for future incompatibilities of this nature to suggest, when using the 'none' build type, to download at a pinned revision branch and fix the TF AAR version in build.gradle to ensure that a known compatible AAR is downloaded.
Closing this issue and tracking the missing convertYUV420SPToARGB8888 method in #12593 (I see there is also a PR pending to add this as well)
body:
@ArtsiomCh We've pushed a 1.3.1-alpha AAR (built from master between 1.3.0 and any upcoming 1.3.1 branch) which contains the native patch necessary to run the model (fixes the Switch error). We'll add some notes for future incompatibilities of this nature to suggest, when using the 'none' build type, to download at a pinned revision branch and fix the TF AAR version in build.gradle to ensure that a known compatible AAR is downloaded.

Closing this issue and tracking the missing `convertYUV420SPToARGB8888` method in #12593 (I see there is also a PR pending to add this as well)
